entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 28. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening then clear. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 5:41 PM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 43 in the morning and minus 37 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 5:41 PM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 33 in the evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:41 PM MST Friday 27 January 2023
